tests.name: versionValid
tests.description: Test a simple source map with a valid version number

tests.name: versionMissing
tests.description: Test a source map that is missing a version field

tests.name: versionNotANumber
tests.description: Test a source map with a version field that is not a number

tests.name: versionNumericString
tests.description: Test a source map with a version field that is a number as a string

tests.name: versionTooHigh
tests.description: Test a source map with an integer version field that is too high

tests.name: versionTooLow
tests.description: Test a source map with an integer version field that is too low

tests.name: mappingsMissing
tests.description: Test a source map that is missing a necessary mappings field

tests.name: sourcesMissing
tests.description: Test a source map that is missing a necessary sources field

tests.name: sourcesNotAList1
tests.description: Test a source map with a sources field that is not a valid list (string)

tests.name: sourcesNotAList2
tests.description: Test a source map with a sources field that is not a valid list (object)

tests.name: sourcesNotStringOrNull
tests.description: Test a source map with a sources list that has non-string and non-null items

tests.name: sourcesContentMissing
tests.description: Test a source map that is missing an optional sourcesContent field

tests.name: sourcesContentNotAList1
tests.description: Test a source map with a sourcesContent field that is not a valid list (string)

tests.name: sourcesContentNotAList2
tests.description: Test a source map with a sourcesContent field that is not a valid list (object)

tests.name: sourcesContentNotStringOrNull
tests.description: Test a source map with a sourcesContent list that has non-string and non-null items

tests.name: sourcesAndSourcesContentBothNull
tests.description: Test a source map that has both null sources and sourcesContent entries

tests.name: fileNotAString1
tests.description: Test a source map with a file field that is not a valid string

tests.name: fileNotAString2
tests.description: Test a source map with a file field that is not a valid string

tests.name: sourceRootNotAString1
tests.description: Test a source map with a sourceRoot field that is not a valid string

tests.name: sourceRootNotAString2
tests.description: Test a source map with a sourceRoot field that is not a valid string

tests.name: namesMissing
tests.description: Test a source map that is missing the optional names field

tests.name: namesNotAList1
tests.description: Test a source map with a names field that is not a valid list (string)

tests.name: namesNotAList2
tests.description: Test a source map with a names field that is not a valid list (object)

tests.name: namesNotString
tests.description: Test a source map with a names list that has non-string items

tests.name: ignoreListEmpty
tests.description: Test a source map with an ignore list that has no items

tests.name: ignoreListValid1
tests.description: Test a source map with a simple valid ignore list

tests.name: ignoreListWrongType1
tests.description: Test a source map with an ignore list with the wrong type of items

tests.name: ignoreListWrongType2
tests.description: Test a source map with an ignore list with the wrong type of items

tests.name: ignoreListWrongType3
tests.description: Test a source map with an ignore list that is not a list

tests.name: ignoreListWrongType4
tests.description: Test a source map with an ignore list with a negative index

tests.name: ignoreListOutOfBounds1
tests.description: Test a source map with an ignore list with an item with an out-of-bounds index (too big)

tests.name: ignoreListOutOfBounds2
tests.description: Test a source map with an ignore list with an item with an out-of-bounds index (too low)

tests.name: unrecognizedProperty
tests.description: Test a source map that has an extra field not explicitly encoded in the spec

tests.name: invalidVLQDueToNonBase64Character
tests.description: Test a source map that has a mapping with an invalid non-base64 character

tests.name: invalidVLQDueToNonBase64CharacterPadding
tests.description: Test a source map that has a mapping with an invalid padding character =

tests.name: invalidVLQDueToMissingContinuationDigits
tests.description: Test a source map that has a mapping with an invalid VLQ that has a continuation bit but no continuing digits

tests.name: invalidMappingNotAString1
tests.description: Test a source map that has an invalid mapping that is not a string (number)

tests.name: invalidMappingNotAString2
tests.description: Test a source map that has an invalid mapping that is not a string (array)

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentBadSeparator
tests.description: Test a source map that uses separator characters not recognized in the spec

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithZeroFields
tests.description: Test a source map that has the wrong number (zero) of segments fields

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithTwoFields
tests.description: Test a source map that has the wrong number (two) of segments fields

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithThreeFields
tests.description: Test a source map that has the wrong number (three) of segments fields

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithSourceIndexOutOfBounds
tests.description: Test a source map that has a source index field that is out of bounds of the sources field

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithNameIndexOutOfBounds
tests.description: Test a source map that has a name index field that is out of bounds of the names field

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithNegativeColumn
tests.description: Test a source map that has an invalid negative non-relative column field

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithNegativeSourceIndex
tests.description: Test a source map that has an invalid negative non-relative source index field

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithNegativeOriginalLine
tests.description: Test a source map that has an invalid negative non-relative original line field

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithNegativeOriginalColumn
tests.description: Test a source map that has an invalid negative non-relative original column field

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithNegativeNameIndex
tests.description: Test a source map that has an invalid negative non-relative name index field

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithNegativeRelativeColumn
tests.description: Test a source map that has an invalid negative relative column field

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithNegativeRelativeSourceIndex
tests.description: Test a source map that has an invalid negative relative source index field

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithNegativeRelativeOriginalLine
tests.description: Test a source map that has an invalid negative relative original line field

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithNegativeRelativeOriginalColumn
tests.description: Test a source map that has an invalid negative relative original column field

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithNegativeRelativeNameIndex
tests.description: Test a source map that has an invalid negative relative name index field

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithColumnExceeding32Bits
tests.description: Test a source map that has a column field that exceeds 32 bits

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithSourceIndexExceeding32Bits
tests.description: Test a source map that has a source index field that exceeds 32 bits

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithOriginalLineExceeding32Bits
tests.description: Test a source map that has a original line field that exceeds 32 bits

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithOriginalColumnExceeding32Bits
tests.description: Test a source map that has an original column field that exceeds 32 bits

tests.name: invalidMappingSegmentWithNameIndexExceeding32Bits
tests.description: Test a source map that has a name index field that exceeds 32 bits

tests.name: validMappingFieldsWith32BitMaxValues
tests.description: Test a source map that has segment fields with max values representable in 32 bits

tests.name: validMappingLargeVLQ
tests.description: Test a source map that has a segment field VLQ that is very long but within 32-bits

tests.name: validMappingEmptyGroups
tests.description: Test a source map with a mapping that has many empty groups

tests.name: validMappingEmptyString
tests.description: Test a source map with an empty string mapping

tests.name: indexMapWrongTypeSections
tests.description: Test an index map with a sections field with the wrong type

tests.name: indexMapWrongTypeOffset
tests.description: Test an index map with an offset field with the wrong type

tests.name: indexMapWrongTypeMap
tests.description: Test an index map with a map field with the wrong type

tests.name: indexMapInvalidBaseMappings
tests.description: Test that an index map cannot also have a regular mappings field

tests.name: indexMapInvalidOverlap
tests.description: Test that an invalid index map with multiple sections that overlap

tests.name: indexMapInvalidOrder
tests.description: Test that an invalid index map with multiple sections in the wrong order

tests.name: indexMapMissingMap
tests.description: Test that an index map that is missing a section map

tests.name: indexMapInvalidSubMap
tests.description: Test that an index map that has an invalid section map

tests.name: indexMapMissingOffset
tests.description: Test that an index map that is missing a section offset

tests.name: indexMapMissingOffsetLine
tests.description: Test that an index map that is missing a section offset's line field

tests.name: indexMapMissingOffsetColumn
tests.description: Test that an index map that is missing a section offset's column field

tests.name: indexMapOffsetLineWrongType
tests.description: Test that an index map that has an offset line field with the wrong type of value

tests.name: indexMapOffsetColumnWrongType
tests.description: Test that an index map that has an offset column field with the wrong type of value

tests.name: indexMapEmptySections
tests.description: Test a trivial index map with no sections

tests.name: indexMapFileWrongType1
tests.description: Test an index map with a file field with the wrong type

tests.name: indexMapFileWrongType2
tests.description: Test an index map with a file field with the wrong type

tests.name: basicMapping
tests.description: Test a simple source map that has several valid mappings

tests.name: sourceRootResolution
tests.description: Similar to basic mapping test, but test resoultion of sources with a sourceRoot field

tests.name: sourceResolutionAbsoluteURL
tests.description: Test resoultion of sources with absolute URLs

tests.name: basicMappingWithIndexMap
tests.description: Test a version of basic-mapping.js.map that is split into sections with an index map

tests.name: indexMapWithMissingFile
tests.description: Same as the basic mapping index map test but without the optional file field

tests.name: indexMapWithTwoConcatenatedSources
tests.description: Test an index map that has two sub-maps for concatenated sources

tests.name: sourcesNullSourcesContentNonNull
tests.description: Test a source map that has a null source but has a sourcesContent

tests.name: sourcesNonNullSourcesContentNull
tests.description: Test a source map that has a non-null source but has a null sourcesContent

tests.name: transitiveMapping
tests.description: Test a simple two-stage transitive mapping from a minified JS to a TypeScript source

tests.name: transitiveMappingWithThreeSteps
tests.description: Test a three-stage transitive mapping from an un-minified JS to minified JS to a TypeScript source

tests.name: vlqValidSingleDigit
tests.description: Test VLQ decoding for a single digit, no continuation VLQ

tests.name: vlqValidNegativeDigit
tests.description: Test VLQ decoding where there's a negative digit, no continuation bit

tests.name: vlqValidContinuationBitPresent1
tests.description: Test VLQ decoding where continuation bits are present (continuations are leading zero)

tests.name: vlqValidContinuationBitPresent2
tests.description: Test VLQ decoding where continuation bits are present (continuations have non-zero bits)

tests.name: mappingSemanticsSingleFieldSegment
tests.description: Test mapping semantics for a single field segment mapping

tests.name: mappingSemanticsFourFieldSegment
tests.description: Test mapping semantics for a four field segment mapping

tests.name: mappingSemanticsFiveFieldSegment
tests.description: Test mapping semantics for a five field segment mapping

tests.name: mappingSemanticsColumnReset
tests.description: Test that the generated column field resets to zero on new lines

tests.name: mappingSemanticsRelative1
tests.description: Test that fields are calculated relative to previous ones

tests.name: mappingSemanticsRelative2
tests.description: Test that fields are calculated relative to previous ones, across lines
